title: Protocolo (2013)
overview: In the future cloning machines known as “Multipliers” were forbidden and abandoned still operating. They still create clones inside them, in an infinite loop that is perpetuated by their security protocol.
storyline: In the future, cloning machines were forbidden. A clone trapped in the multiplier machine tries to escape. When he investigates about his own existence finds out some clues that could lead to his survival avoiding the security protocol.
